title: Leak suspect's bosses twice warned him over handling of classified info: Filing
description: Jack Teixeira was twice admonished by his superiors last year over his "concerning actions" with regards to classified information, prosecutors said in a court filing

title: Federal appeals court questions FDA rollback of abortion pill restrictions
description: A federal appeals court in New Orleans heard arguments in a high-stakes bid to invalidate FDA approval of the most widely used abortion medication in the country.

title: Montana becomes 1st state to ban TikTok; law likely to be challenged
description: Montana has become the first state to completely ban TikTok

title: WATCH:  Navy father surprises daughter at college graduation
description: Douglas Hernandez flew in from overseas to see his daughter graduate!

title: USDA considers ban on chocolate milk in schools to combat childhood obesity
description: The USDA has proposed a ban on chocolate milk in school cafeterias due to rising levels of childhood obesity in the U.S.

title: Kremlin reacts to CIA video aimed at recruiting frustrated Russians as spies
description: The video is available on the encrypted Telegram app favored by Russians.

title: NYC truck terror attacker to serve 8 consecutive life sentences
description: Sayfullo Saipov was sentenced Wednesday for his 2017 ISIS-inspired terror attack in New York City.

title: House expected to consider resolution to expel Rep. Santos from Congress
description: Rep. George Santos faces the possibility of disciplinary measures from his colleagues in the House.

title: Man indicted in theft of 'Wizard of Oz' ruby slippers worn by Judy Garland
description: A federal grand jury has indicted a man who is suspected of stealing a pair of famous ruby red slippers worn by Dorothy in the Wizard of Oz. Federal prosecutors said Terry Martin was indicted Tuesday on one count of theft of major artwork

title: 9 migrants found, 41 still missing after kidnapping in Mexico
description: Nine migrants were found Tuesday by Mexican authorities after a group of 50 migrants were kidnapped earlier this week.

title: Limo company operator found guilty of manslaughter stemming from crash that killed 20
description: A limousine company operator was charged with second-degree manslaughter for a 2018 crash in upstate New York that left 20 dead.

title: Death toll up to 7 after hippo capsized canoe in Malawi; 17 missing
description: The death toll has risen to seven people after a hippopotamus charged into and capsized a canoe on a river in the southern African nation of Malawi

title: Elizabeth Holmes requests May 30 as new date to report to prison after losing her bid to remain free
description: Disgraced Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes has asked a federal judge to allow her to remain free through the Memorial Day weekend before surrendering to authorities on May 30

title: PEN America, Penguin Random House sue over banned books in Florida school district
description: PEN America and Penguin Random House filed a lawsuit Wednesday targeting a Florida school district for removing certain books from the shelves of school libraries.

title: WATCH:  Baby's scream turns into giggles as he plays with dad
description: Rebecca Ochoa's video, featuring a hilarious moment between her son and his dad, has gone viral on TikTok.

title: Tech reporter breaks down OpenAI CEO's testimony, potential regulatory challenges
description: Start Here host Brad Mielke spoke to Gizmodo technology reporter Thomas Germain.

title: Quadruple murder suspect caught 10 days after jail break
description: An inmate accused of killing four people has been apprehended after escaping from a Philadelphia jail more than a week ago, police said.

title: WATCH:  Baby's scream turns into giggles as he plays with dad
description: Rebecca Ochoa's video, featuring a hilarious moment between her son and his dad, has gone viral on TikTok.

title: Biden says he's 'confident' US will avert default as he departs for foreign trip
description: As Biden left Washington for Asia, he said he was "confident" the U.S. would raise the debt ceiling and avert default.

title: Grand jury indicts alleged murderer of 4 University of Idaho students
description: The suspect in the murder of four University of Idaho students has been indicted by a grand jury. Bryan Kohberger, 28, is expected to appear in court Monday.

title: WATCH:  Fan brings packet of lyrics to sing along on Taylor Swift's Eras Tour
description: She came prepared with a reading light and everything.

title: US drug overdose deaths slightly increased in 2022, CDC says
description: Drug overdose deaths in the U.S. rose slightly in 2022

title: 2 teens arrested in Yuma house party mass shooting
description: Two teenagers have been arrested in a mass shooting that erupted at a house party in Yuma, Arizona, over the weekend, police said.

title: Harry and Meghan pursued by 'aggressive' paparazzi in car chase: Spokesperson
description: The duke and duchess' spokesperson said the car chase lasted two hours.

title: Chief: Man shot by police ran at 'full sprint' toward officer while holding sword over head
description: Police in Massachusetts say an officer shot a man who was running at him at a full sprint with a sword over his head

title: Russia orders arrest of prominent producer, director who criticized Ukraine war
description: A Moscow court has ordered the arrest of prominent film producer Alexander Rodnyansky and theater director Ivan Vyrypaev for “spreading false information” about the Russian army

title: Abortion pill case moves to appeals court, on track for Supreme Court
description: A federal appeals court in New Orleans hears arguments Wednesday on whether a drug used in the most common method of abortion was properly approved by a government agency more than two decades ago

title: Trial begins over Kari Lake’s last challenge to loss in Arizona governor’s race
description: A three-day trial is scheduled to begin over the only remaining legal claim in Republican Kari Lake’s challenge of her loss in the Arizona governor’s race to Democrat Katie Hobbs

title: Ford recalls 310,000 trucks to fix problem with driver's front air bag
description: Ford is recalling more than 310,000 trucks in the U.S. because the driver’s front air bag may not inflate in a crash

title: 1-year-old boy accidentally shot by 4-year-old brother in Texas, authorities say
description: A 1-year-old boy is expected to survive after he was accidentally shot by his 4-year-old brother at their home in Texas on Tuesday afternoon, authorities said.

title: 2 US Consulate staff members killed in Nigeria
description: Two staff members of the U.S. Consulate in Nigeria were among the four people killed by armed assailants when an American convoy was attacked on Tuesday.

title: 5 go on trial in Germany over far-right extremist plot to kidnap health minister
description: Five people are going on trial in Germany accused of planning a coup and plotting to kidnap the country’s health minister

title: New Zealand police say hostel fire that killed 6 was arson
description: New Zealand police say they believe a fire that killed at least six people in a Wellington hostel was arson and launched a homicide investigation

title: Former French President Sarkozy loses appeal on corruption conviction
description: A French appeals court on Wednesday upheld a one-year prison sentence for former President Nicolas Sarkozy on a conviction for corruption and influence peddling

title: Biden heads to Asia as US faces debt limit crisis
description: He said he was cutting his trip short to deal with "final negotiations."

title: Wanted man swaps seats with dog during DUI arrest, blames animal for speeding
description: A Colorado man has been arrested after blaming a dog for driving over the speed limit when he swapped seats with the animal when he got pulled over, police say.

title: 3 dead as heavy rains in northern Italy burst riverbanks, flood towns
description: Officials in northern Italy are warning residents to get to higher ground amid fears that rain-swollen rivers could again burst their banks

title: Thrown beer can leads to fatal shooting in Florida
description: A Florida man threw a beer can at a passing dune buggy, then fatally shot the driver after a confrontation, according to court records.

title: New York rapper Sheff G charged in series of shootings
description: Michael Williams, known as Sheff G, is among 32 purported street gang members charged Tuesday in a series of shootings in Brooklyn.

title: Missouri terminates emergency rule to limit trans care for minors, some adults
description: Missouri officials terminated the Republican attorney general’s emergency rule that would have placed limits on transgender care for minors and some adults

title: Court rejects Elizabeth Holmes' latest effort to stay out of prison while on appeal
description: Disgraced Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes appears to be soon bound for prison

title: North Carolina Legislature overrides governor's veto of abortion ban
description: The GOP-led North Carolina Legislature on Tuesday night overrode Gov. Roy Cooper's veto of a 12-week abortion ban.

title: Vaccine authorized for emergency use in California condors amid bird flu outbreak
description: California condors will receive a vaccine for a deadly strain of avian influenza that threatens the already critically endangered vulture species
